EmailTemplate.description: To send to client when case is closed, now under Cust Surveys
EmailTemplate.name: YBN - Issue Resolution Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Contacting Yodle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
At Yodle, we want to make sure every service experience you have with us is a great one. Looks like we recently spent some time with you. We'd love your feedback to make sure we handled everything you needed.
If you could please take a moment to fill out the below survey. Your feedback is key to our continued success!
http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=nn9jxrk20mc9&q2={!Case.Id}&q3={!Case.AccountId}
Thank you,
Brandon Ramos Senior Vice President, Client Services
Â©{!User.Today_s_Year__c} by Yodle Web.com, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
